Key Match Events: Adam Lallana scored the winning goal in the fifth minute of stoppage time against Slovakia
Pre-Game Insights: Sam Allardyce announced his line-up two days before the game in Slovakia, selecting John Stones, Wayne Rooney, and Adam Lallana
Post-Match Reflections: Sam Allardyce praised Gareth Southgate after England's World Cup semi-final defeat by Croatia in 2018, saying he was blameless
Miscellaneous Highlights: The article mentions a lucky Slovakian coin given to Sam Allardyce by a local, but he ultimately chucked it away in a fit of rage
Others: The article discusses Sam Allardyce's tenure as England manager, his departure, and the circumstances surrounding his exit
